item.title: CVE-2024-31215|2024-04-04T16:10:18.954Z -- mobsf -- mobile-security-framework-mobsf
item.description: Mobile Security Framework (MobSF) is a security research platform for mobile applications in Android, iOS and Windows Mobile. A SSRF vulnerability in firebase database check logic. The attacker can cause the server to make a connection to internal-only services within the organizationâ€™s infrastructure. When a malicious app is uploaded to Static analyzer, it is possible to make internal requests. This vulnerability has been patched in version 3.9.8.
